page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: The parish is now part of the United Benefice of St. Mary, Udimore with St. George, Brede, so services at both churches work in conjunction with each other. Normally, at Udimore there is a Eucharist at 8.00 am each Sunday, and Evensong on most Sundays; once a month there is a Sung Eucharist and on special occasions there is Mattins.thealternative Service Book Rite B is used for theeucharist, but the Book of Common Prayer is used for Evensong. At most services there are about 20 people, most of whom are elderly or retired. At Udimore there are few young families so there is no Sunday School. Many of the Church activities are also village activities and reflect the passing seasons. The church is seriously cared for by the small population.
